Pan Card :

I]Identity proof documents (one of):


1)Elector's photo identity card 
2)Ration card having photograph of the applicant 
3)Passport 
4)Driving licence 
5)Arm's license 
6)Aadhaar card issued by the Unique Identification Authority of India 
7)Photo identity card issued by the Central Government or State Government or a Public Sector Undertaking 
8)Pensioner Card having photograph of the applicant 
9)Central Government Health Scheme Card or Ex-servicemen Contributory Heath Scheme photo card 
10)Certificate of identity in original signed by a Member of Parliament or Member of Legislative Assembly or Municipal Councillor or a Gazetted Officer, as the case may be 
11)Bank certificate in original on letter head from the branch (along with name and stamp of the issuing officer) containing duly attested photograph and bank account number of the applicant


II]Address proof document (one of)


1)copy of the following documents of not more than three months old 
2)electricity bill 
3)landline telephone or broadband connection bill 
4)water bill 
5)consumer gas connection card or book or piped gas bill 
6)bank account statement 
7)depository account statement 
8)credit card statement 
9)copy of post office pass book having address of the applicant 
10)passport 
11)passport of the spouse 
12)voter ID card 
13)latest property tax assessment order 
14)driving licence 
15)domicile certificate issued by the Government 
16)Aadhaar card issued by the UIDAI 
17)allotment letter of accommodation issued by the Central Government or State Government of not more than three years old 
18)property registration document 
19)certificate of address signed by a Member of Parliament or Member of Legislative Assembly or Municipal Councillor or a Gazetted Officer 
20)employerâ€™s certificate in original


III]Proof of date of birth (one of):


1)birth certificate issued by the Municipal Authority or any office authorised to issue Birth and Death Certificate by the Registrar of Birth and Deaths or the Indian Consulate as defined in clause (d) of sub section (1) of section 2 of the Citizenship Act, 1955 (57 of 1955) pension payment order 
2)marriage certificate issued by Registrar of Marriages 
3)matriculation certificate 
4)passport 
5)driving licence 
6)domicile certificate issued by the Government 
7)affidavit sworn before a magistrate stating the date of birth
